Entries.Introduction: A human, huh?$3#$b#Nice to meet you, I guess.$3
Entries.Wed: I wanna go play with the fishies!$1#$b#And then maybe eat them afterwards.$0
Entries.Thu: Bluey's ice cream is to die for.$4#$b#Pinky's is just okay, I guess.$3
Entries.Fri: Fridays are fun days!$1#$e#I don't actually know what to do though.$3
